title: Do I get a chance of getting accepted into the top 30 schools with a 4.21 GPA weighted, 3.86 unweighted with 107 in TOEFL as an Asian female student who wants to major in physics? I have two 4s in two AP physics and one 5 in AP calc bc. - Quora
tags: Grade Point Average and University Admissions
Colleges and Universities in the United States of America

response.answer_text: Are you a US national. If accepted in US public univ, you will pay a lot of money for international tuition. Otherwise, apply and find out. Do not spend a bunch of money on application fees. Select colleges with known quality physics programs. Apply to your state flagship univ, they will have a quality physics program .Be aware that few students aspiring for physics degree succeed. Good luck.
